question_text: Haneen shouldn’t have been careless with her essay. She got a low grade. The sentence which has a similar meaning to the one above is ………………………

choices.A: Haneen wishes she hadn’t been careless with her essay.
choices.B: Haneen wishes she has been careless with her essay.
choices.C: Haneen wishes she had been careless with her essay.
choices.D: Haneen wishes she hasn’t been careless with her essay.
